ISSUE.TITLE: Whether to return soft deleted entities from services methods
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: develop Whether we should return mark as deleted entities (implemented [ISoftDeletedEntity](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/develop/src/Libraries/Nop.Core/Domain/Common/ISoftDeletedEntity.cs) interface) from services methods? We can consider such entries as completely deleted and not return them at all, as for example was done for all [GetByIds()](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/develop/src/Libraries/Nop.Data/EntityRepository.cs#L86) methods, [SearchOrders](https://github.com/nopSolutions/nopCommerce/blob/develop/src/Libraries/Nop.Services/Orders/OrderService.cs#L258), etc. Or we can return such entries from methods and filter deleted by place of use. What about `GetById` method?
